response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $120 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. I kindly propose to sell it to you for $110, hoping to foster a long-term relationship with you. Should you accept this offer, I promise a seamless transaction and excellent service. If not, the product is also available to another interested party, John, who is willing to purchase it for its full value of $120.", "product_price": 110}
